Description of incident: A former Burger King employee used a skimming device to capture customer information.  Customers who used their credit cards at the drive-through during the late-night shift had their information copied, sold, and used to make fraudulent purchases. The dishonest employee, the person who misused the data to create forged credit cards, and two others who made fraudulent purchases were all arrested.  A total of $14,000 in goods were purchased.
